mapper.select: select C.user_no, B.test_no from ord_test_infos B, ord_tests C where B.ord_test_no = C.ord_test_no and C.user_no = #{value} and B.test_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into ORD_TESTS (ORD_TEST_NO, USER_NO, ORD_TEST_TOTAL_PRICE) values (#{no}, #{userNo}, #{totalPrice})
insert into ORD_TEST_INFOS (ORD_TEST_INFOS_NO, ORD_TEST_NO, TEST_NO, COUPON_NO) values (ord_test_infos_seq.nextval, #{orderNo}, #{testNo}, #{couponNo})
mapper.select: SELECT C.ORD_TEST_NO orderNo, B.TEST_NAME testTitle, C.ORD_TEST_TOTAL_PRICE totalPrice, C.ORD_TEST_CREATE_DATE testCreateDate, B.TEST_PRICE testprice, B.TEST_EP ep, B.TEST_NO testNo, D.coupon_no couponNo FROM USERS A, TESTS B, ORD_TESTS C, ORD_TEST_INFOS D WHERE A.USER_NO = C.USER_NO AND B.TEST_NO = D.TEST_NO AND D.ORD_TEST_NO = C.ORD_TEST_NO AND C.ORD_TEST_NO = #{value}
